description: MediaTab provides you information of your multimedia files, like MediaInfo does, but without the need to launch an application. MediaTab use the power of MediaInfo integrating it on your operating system. The only thing you must to do is right click on a multimedia file, choose Properties and pick MediaTab. All info you need to hand!
summary: MediaTab provides you information of your multimedia files.
author: Juan Manuel Lozano Contreras (Shalafi)
